itunes:title: Rob Ferretti (C8 Ownership, Ferrari maintenance, and more)
itunes:author: Matt Farah & Zack Klapman
itunes:summary: Rob Ferretti was in the automotive video game before just about anyone. He used to sell DVDs featuring automotive mayhem, rallies, burnouts, and speeding tickets. He's also been the man behind several exotic car rental companies, so he knows all the ins and out of just about every exotic car, including which ones break and how to fix them. He has a wealth of knowledge and we're going to get into all of it.Check out his YouTube channel at YouTube.Com/SuperSpeedersRob
itunes:subtitle: Rob Ferretti was in the automotive video game before just about anyone. He used to sell DVDs featuring automotive mayhem, rallies, burnouts, and speeding tickets. He's also been the man behind several exotic car rental companies, so he knows all the ins and out of just about every exotic car, including which ones break and how to fix them. He has a wealth of knowledge and we're going to get into all of it.Check out his YouTube channel at YouTube.Com/SuperSpeedersRob
